description:
Pursue your passion for the outdoors and over rocky, muddy terrain, a mid-height collar adds stability when carrying heavier packs.

  • Durable upper with synthetic mesh inserts
  • Gore-Tex Performance Comfort waterproof-breathable membrane
  • Variable thickness TPU torsion system for stability
  • Dual-density EVA midsole balances shock-absorption and support
  • Scarpa Crossover outsole with SuperGum rubber and 4.5mm aggressive lugs
name: Scarpa Maverick Mid Gore-Tex Hiking Boots - Men's
